courseDescription:
Whether you are brand new to project management or have considerable experience already, managing and completing a project within the deadline and budget is not an easy task. Yet, each new project demands effective project management (PM). This course is designed to guide you through the fundamental concepts of PM. We begin by exploring the building blocks of project management like the project framework, requirements, and plans.

Next, the material explains the process of developing an effective project schedule. You will learn about communication tools and methods, project deliverables, and the importance of project activities. If a project takes more time than you predict, you might miss deadlines or use more resources than expected, so we will also discuss the different techniques for estimating the timetable accurately.

Finally, you will learn how to write an effective status report and discuss controlling costs through budgeting, tracking, and reporting. You will also see why, before putting a project behind you, you must review the closure checklist, ensure that your work is truly finished, and acknowledge your team. Upgrade your knowledge and start this exciting PM online course today.
